LoginPage.title: Login
LoginPage.description: Enter your email below to receive a magic link to sign in to your account.

DashboardPage.title: Your Acres
DashboardPage.description: Please submit additional information about your land. This information will help us process your application faster.
DashboardPage.land_information_placeholder: Any additional details about your land you want us to know
DashboardPage.agrivoltaics_description: New and unique way of deploying both solar and keep farming arable land
DashboardPage.photovoltaics_description: Traditional solar deployment on acres that will not be used for agriculture
DashboardPage.help_me_decide_description: We will assess your situation and figure out what would work best for your acres
DashboardPage.help_me_decide_breakup: We'll decide the ideal deployment type
DashboardPage.self_finance_description: I will finance the project myself without outside capital
DashboardPage.solarpunk_financed_description: 0% risk, paid fully upfront by Solarpunk. 50% revenue share
DashboardPage.alert_content: If you want to make any changes to your land selection, please do so now using the map to the left before submitting the form.
